source.sqlReaderQuery:
select a.ParamName,a.SourcePath,a.SourceFolder,a.SourceFileType_New as SourceFileType,a.TargetPath,a.TargetFolder,a.TargetFileType,a.ExcludeFiles,a.ActiveFlag from (
select ParamName,SourcePath,SourceFolder,SourceFileType,TargetPath,TargetFolder,TargetFileType,ExcludeFiles, ActiveFlag, CASE 
				WHEN (SourceFileType is NULL) THEN '*'
				ELSE SourceFileType
				end as SourceFileType_New 
				from [cglhdatabase].[dbo].[CGConfiguration] 
where GroupName='CopyFiles' and ActiveFlag = 'Y') a

select a.ParamName,a.SourcePath,a.SourceFolder,a.SourceFileType_New as SourceFileType,a.TargetPath,a.TargetFolder,a.TargetFileType,a.ExcludeFiles,a.ActiveFlag from (
select ParamName,SourcePath,SourceFolder,SourceFileType,TargetPath,TargetFolder,TargetFileType,ExcludeFiles, ActiveFlag, CASE 
				WHEN (SourceFileType is NULL) THEN '*'
				ELSE SourceFileType
				end as SourceFileType_New 
				from [cglhdatabase].[dbo].[CGConfiguration] 
where GroupName='CopyFiles' and ActiveFlag = 'Y') a

select SourcePath,SourceFolder,SourceFileType,SQLTargetDatabase,SQLTargetUser,SQLTargetPassword,SQLTargetTable from [cglhdatabase].[dbo].[CGConfiguration] 
where GroupName='CopyFiles_BLOBtoSQL' and ActiveFlag='y'
